Judul: The cell cycle: development of an eLearning animation
Abstrak:
The use of eLearning resources is becoming increasingly widespread in medical education
because of its numerous advantages. They awaken interest in students can be reused with-
out loss of quality and give students added control over their own education by allowing
them to review content in their own time. This article describes the development and evalu-
ation of an innovative eLearning animation for the curriculum of the pathology class at the
University of Dundee School of Medicine.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Richard Oparka, Annie Campbell  and Caroline Erolin
Sumber: JOURNAL OF VISUAL COMMUNICATION IN MEDICINE, 2017 VOL. 40, NO. 1, 13 – 20
